name: Hong Kong Fried Chicken Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Hong Kong Fried Chicken Recipe: Chicken (Boneless, cubed) ½ kg Flour ½ cup Corn Flour ½ cup Egg (Beaten) 1 Garlic (Crushed) 1 tsp Dark Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Light Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Vinegar 1 tbsp Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Oil For deep frying Garlic (Crushed) 2 tsp Vinegar 2 tbsp Brown Sugar 2 tbsp Ketchup 2 tbsp Worcestershire Sauce 2 tbsp Water ½ cup Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Corn Flour 1 tbsp Oil As required
instructions: Marinate chicken with all ingredients for marination and deep fry twice. Serve with prepared sauce. Heat oil, fry garlic and add in all the rest of the ingredients for sauce.
